crnrstn_element.crnrstn_description: The CRNRSTN Suite :: simply would not be complete if its http_manager :: class did not come with a method for accessing HTTP header information.
crnrstn_element.crnrstn_returnedvalue: An array or string...as specified via the parameter passed to the method.

crnrstn_techspecscontent.crnrstn_techspec: It is recommended that you upgrade to the latest version of PHP to take advantage of the latest gains in security and processing efficiency.
Currently tested on an Ubuntu Server 16.04 running PHP 7.0.22 and Redhat Linux running PHP 5.5.38.

crnrstn_parameter.crnrstn_paramdefinition: The desired return type for the header information of either 'string' or 'array'.
